column4: hi. is it possible to roll back to an older nvidia-current version or manually install an nvidia driver? the latest one in lucid ppa has many errors for wow
yes, but my question is probably better as - how do i do a manual install of the driver so i can use the ppa once a newer one get in
a newer one gets in where? you have to remove the ppa one, take it out of your sources.list then install from additional drivers (ie jockey-gtk)
